extendedInfo.description: Game designed by an 8 year old, graphics drawn by a 4 year old, and programmed by an unemployed 30 year old. This isn't Star Wars. This is Paper Wars!Spend your credits, place your fighters and frigates, and use your fingers to aim and destroy the other side before they destroy you, and save the galaxy while you're at it. What's not to like?Featuring an epic (haha) 10 chapter story mode, plus human vs human skirmish mode, as well as an unlockable CPU skirmish mode where you earn victories to rank up!New Official Website (with getting started guide): http://www.digital-digest.com/apps/paperstarwars/Join us on Facebook:http://www.facebook.com/pages/Paper-Star-Wars/226757740697471And Twitter:http://twitter.com/PaperStarWarsFind a bug?Please post crash reports via the built-in crash reporting feature, or if you find a non crashing bug, please email paperstarwars@digital-digest.com with a full description of your bug. Thanks.

reviews.title: Htc one
reviews.comment: As soon as i place my ships in chapter 8, the game crashes
reviews.author: estevan gutierrez

reviews.title: Fun with copyright infringement!
reviews.comment: Sir, I enjoyed your exercise in lawyer-baiting and virtual paper-wasting. I expect a huge improvement in he graphics in the full version. Haha, just kidding. I think this\'ll be great on long trips, like tic-tac-toe but with less rebel bias. BTW, did you hear about how Palpatine lied about when he officially left the Galactic Senate?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: This is dissapointing
reviews.comment: The game is ok but it crashes every time i try to play level 4 and two player mode it crashes. Samsung galaxy s3 lte
reviews.author: Jon Orm

reviews.title: Fun, but crashes
reviews.comment: I like the concept and have fun playing. My problem is it crashes after level 3. Purchased full version and emailed with my problem like a month ago, no reply. I\'m on a HTC Rezound. Maybe others work, but disappointed with no reply to complaint.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fun, but...
reviews.comment: This is a fun game, but whenever I try playing the fourth level or a two player match, the app will close back to the menu. I really like this game, but it is really not fun when you cannot play.
reviews.author: Sean Hamill

reviews.title: Xperia s
reviews.comment: Force closes after 3rd level good game until then like fix please
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Expand!
reviews.comment: Good game, game style is fun and easy to learn. Story line is lacking, I suggest expanding missions through episode 6. Give gamers something lengthy and exciting.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Great fun but the story feels a little short. Could do with being able to move during battles as in space squadron. Great effort
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Good stuff. Me and my son play the 2player mode. Worth the scratch.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Bought app after liking Lite ver., to support Dev. Clever & worthy time killer. Alex is right. Multiplayer on wish list.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work
reviews.comment: No fire button shows up making me unable to play also ships don\'t show apart from green health dots. Don\'t think developer cares about this now he\'s made some money
reviews.author: ben miller
